name: Unstable (Steven Benson)
description:
I would really appreciate if you play the game, if you could complete this survey as it will help me with research for my Honours Project:   Analysing how atmosphere and aesthetics effects the players’ mood and immersion/cognitive flow in games.

The survey can be found here: https://forms.gle/t32dSjTijndbzvip6

Unstable is a prototype Walking Simulator in which you play as the main character called John. He is just out of university and is invited to see about a job position in a laboratory. However, the tour takes a drastic twist and John finds himself in a tricky position.
